name: mignonette
content:
mignonette noun
(PLANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a tall plant with a lot of small, sweet-smelling flowers growing together at the tops of the stems: Some pinks and mignonette grew near a sunny stone wall. The hardy annual mignonette is always listed with scented plants.
More examplesFewer examplesThe containers were planted with Rosa damascena, mignonette, honeysuckle, and wallflowers.

mignonette noun
(SAUCE)
[ U ] (also mignonette sauce) a sauce made from shallots (= small onions), black pepper, and vinegar: Six fresh raw oysters were served with a traditional mignonette. Mignonette sauce is a classic accompaniment to raw oysters.
